title: Blended Learning Program for Improving Nursing Mathematics Competency

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic skills and comprehension of fundamental medication administration concepts
context.additional_context: Implementing a blended learning environment using personal devices (BYOD) for novice nurses working in medical institutions.

learning_goals: Learners can solve medication dosage calculation problems with over 85% accuracy
Learners can diagnose medication error scenarios with 90% accuracy and propose improvement strategies using real-world cases provided in blended learning environments
Learners can achieve an average score of 4.0/5.0 or higher on self-efficacy surveys upon program completion
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
